mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOT_BBS (BBS_NO, TOPIC, USER_EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, GOOD, READCOUNT, DEL, COMMENTCOUNT) VALUES(foot_bbs_seq.nextval,#{topic},#{user_email},#{title},#{content},SYSDATE, 0,0,0,0)

INSERT INTO FOOT_GALLERY (GALLERY_NO, USER_EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, GOOD, READCOUNT, DEL, IMAGEURL, COMMENTCOUNT) VALUES(foot_gallery_seq.nextval,#{user_email},#{title},#{content},SYSDATE, 0,0,0,#{imageurl},0)
INSERT INTO FOOT_BBS_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, PARENT_BBS_NO, USER_EMAIL, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL) VALUES(foot_comment_seq.nextval,#{parent_bbs_no},#{user_email},#{content},SYSDATE,0)
INSERT INTO FOOT_GALLERY_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, PARENT_GALLERY_NO, USER_EMAIL, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL) VALUES(foot_gallery_comment_seq.nextval,#{parent_gallery_no},#{user_email},#{content},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_PROFILE, C.COMMENT_NO, C.PARENT_BBS_NO, C.USER_EMAIL, C.CONTENT, C.WDATE, C.DEL FROM FOOT_BBS_COMMENT C, FOOT_USER U WHERE PARENT_BBS_NO = #{parent_bbs_no} AND C.USER_EMAIL = U.USER_EMAIL ORDER BY COMMENT_NO ASC
SELECT * FROM FOOT_BBS ORDER BY BBS_NO DESC

SELECT NVL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM FOOT_BBS WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'

SELECT NVL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM FOOT_GALLERY WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'

SELECT U.USER_PROFILE, B.BBS_NO, B.TOPIC, B.USER_EMAIL, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.WDATE, B.GOOD, B.READCOUNT, B.DEL, B.COMMENTCOUNT FROM FOOT_BBS B, FOOT_USER U WHERE B.BBS_NO=#{bbs_no} AND U.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL

SELECT U.USER_PROFILE, G.GALLERY_NO, G.USER_EMAIL, G.TITLE, G.CONTENT, G.WDATE, G.GOOD, G.READCOUNT, G.DEL, G.IMAGEURL, G.COMMENTCOUNT FROM FOOT_GALLERY G, FOOT_USER U WHERE G.GALLERY_NO=#{gallery_no} AND U.USER_EMAIL = G.USER_EMAIL
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOT_BBS SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=(SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE bbs_no=#{bbs_no}) AND STEP>(SELECT STEP FROM BBS WHERE bbs_no=#{bbs_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (bbs_no,ID,TITLE,CONTENT,REF,STEP, DEPTH, PARENT, DEL, WDATE, READCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT) VALUES( bbs_no_BBS.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{title},#{content}, (SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE bbs_no=#{bbs_no}), (SELECT STEP FROM BBS WHERE bbs_no=#{bbs_no})+1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM BBS WHERE bbs_no=#{bbs_no})+1, #{bbs_no},0,SYSDATE,0,0)
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_PROFILE, G.COMMENT_NO, G.PARENT_GALLERY_NO, G.USER_EMAIL, G.CONTENT, G.WDATE, G.DEL FROM FOOT_GALLERY_COMMENT G, FOOT_USER U WHERE PARENT_GALLERY_NO = #{parent_gallery_no} AND G.USER_EMAIL = U.USER_EMAIL ORDER BY COMMENT_NO ASC
